title: The Beginning
description: This is where our story starts. The moment I first saw you, something just clicked - all thanks to the ICE CREAM!

title: First Conversation
description: Our first real conversation through voice call.I was really nervous and so were you but I could have talked to you for hours.

title: When I came to meet you
description: I was enchanted when I first saw you. You know I had to look twice. Even the place seemed to be chosen by gods for us to meet each other in front of them.

title: Durga Pooja and your birthday
description: The feeling of having a wife took over me that day. I was so happy to have you by my side. Doing things together and sharing our joys and sorrows has been the best part of my life.

title: First Christmas Together
description: Our first Christmas. Even if we were miles apart, my heart was with you every second.
